attributes.action: Allow Wales and Scotland Assemblies who are Independant entities to be able to exercise their right to decide their own future within the EU by holding their own referndum as to the acceptance of the EU Treaty/Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wales and Scotland now have their own Governments that are Nationalistic in make up, and it is only right that the people of Wales, Scotland and now Northern Ireland be given the chance to vote on an issue that will impact on heir lives
